trans-unit.source: Use the `FindUnderPath` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`FindUnderPath`專案檔來建立和執行這項工作中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [FindUnderPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 用法和參數資訊，請參閱[FindUnderPath 工作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task executes successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工作執行成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the files whose paths should be compared with the path specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定其路徑應該與指定的路徑進行比較的檔案<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The files whose paths should be compared with the path specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*> property.
trans-unit.target: 其路徑應該與指定的路徑進行比較的檔案<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.FindUnderPath.Path*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the items that were found under the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定路徑下找到的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items that were found under the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定路徑下的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the items that were not found under the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定路徑下未找到的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items that were not found under the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 找不到所指定路徑下的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the folder path to use as the reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要當成參考的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The folder path to use as the reference.
trans-unit.target: 要當成參考的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the paths of the output items should be updated to be absolute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出輸出項目的路徑是否應該更新為絕對。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paths of the output items should be updated to be absolute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果輸出項目的路徑應該更新為絕對。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
